name: dubwool

abilities.name: fluffy
abilities.description: Halves the damage taken from moves that make direct contact, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.

abilities.name: steadfast
abilities.description: Raises Speed each time the Pokémon flinches.

abilities.name: bulletproof
abilities.description: Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves.

description:
Weave a carpet from its springy wool, and you end
up with something closer to a trampoline. You’ll
start to bounce the moment you set foot on it.
